verses.roman:
dui-jana kahe,--'tumi īśvara 'svatantra'
yei icchā, sei karibā, naha 'paratantra'

synonyms: dui-jana kahe—the two persons replied; tumi—You; īśvara—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; svatantra—completely independent; yei icchā—whatever You desire; sei—that; karibā—You will do; naha—You are not; para-tantra—dependent on anyone.
translation: Upon hearing this, Rāmānanda Rāya and Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī replied, "Dear Lord, You are completely independent. Since You are not dependent on anyone, You do whatever You desire.
